data.what_is: X2CRM is an open source CRM platform for marketing, sales, customer service and other custom applications powered by an easy to use workflow engine and process management framework. Manage your clients with an endlessly customizable, powerful app, and boost your productivity like never before.
data.product_description: X2CRM is an open source CRM platform for marketing, sales, customer service and other custom applications powered by an easy to use workflow engine and process management framework. Manage your clients with an endlessly customizable, powerful app, and boost your productivity like never before.
